description: Single-storey rear extension of dwellinghouse; alteration of roof of outbuilding from dual to mono pitch; alteration of exterior of outbuilding involing cladding with brick slips and installation of rear facing window; alteration of main roof from hip to gable end; roof extension to rear of main roofslope incorporating a Juliet balcony; installation of single rooflight to front roofslope; and alteration to rear garden involving landscaping
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawing titles: 40, Brentmead Gardens, Park Royal, Ealing, NW10 7DS (Location Plan); 180101/ARC/LIC/009/R/A Rev. A; 180101/ARC/LIC/010/R/A Rev. A (Received 21.08.2018); 180101/ARC/LIC/011/R/A Rev. A (Received 21.08.2018); 180101/ARC/LIC/012/R/A Rev. A (Received 21.08.2018); 180101/ARC/LIC/013/R/A Rev. A (Received 21.08.2018); 180101/ARC/LIC/014/R/A Rev. A; 180101/ARC/LIC/015/R/A Rev. A (Received 21.08.2018); and180101/ARC/LIC/016/R/A Rev. A.

REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | Notwithstanding the Juliet balcony depicted in the drawings listed in Condition 2, no part of any roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).
